newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Bucharest bourse changes trading hours.
newsitem.headline: Bucharest bourse changes trading hours.

text.p: The Bucharest bourse said on Thursday it was cutting its pre-market pricing session to boost continuous trading time by 90 minutes from next Tuesday.
Brokers, welcoming the move, said it was part of an effort to strengthen the fledgling exchange which has suffered from low volumes recently.
A bourse statement said a previous two-hour session of continuous trading would be expanded to three and a half hours with pricing taking only 30 minutes instead of two hours.
Trading in the exchange's 13 stocks would continue to open at 0930 local/0630 GMT twice a week, on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
